summary: Comprehensive E2E testing of Level Up (Quest Rush) dopamine productivity system completed. Fixed MongoDB ObjectId serialization bug in daily/weekly quests endpoints. All 30 backend API tests pass (100%). Frontend UI and navigation working correctly across all pages.

fixed_bugs.issue: MongoDB ObjectId serialization error - 'ObjectId' object is not iterable
fixed_bugs.fix: Excluded _id field from response dict after insert_one

passed_tests: Landing page loads with real-time stats (7+ Warriors, 2+ Tasks, 100% Success Rate)
Auth page - login/signup flows work correctly with JWT tokens
Dashboard loads with user stats (Level, Streak, Discipline, Tasks Done)
XP progress bar and level system working
Task Hub - task creation and completion with XP rewards
Boss Challenge page - AI exam system with grading (A*, A, B, C, D, F)
Daily Quests endpoint working (3+ quests per day)
AI Coach chat with 4 modes (Strict, Strategic, Analytical, Motivational)
Focus Mode timer with NORMAL/EMERGENCY/BOSS MODE options
Analytics page with burnout risk detection
Skill Trees page (Mind, Knowledge, Discipline, Fitness)
Achievements page (6 achievements: First Steps, Speed Demon, Week Warrior, Rising Star, Focus Master, Discipline God)
Admin Panel at /system-control with Rebadion/Rebadion2010 login
Admin dashboard shows stats, users table, ADD ADMIN button
Navigation between all pages working correctly
seed_data_creation: Test users created during testing with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. MongoDB ObjectId bug fixed. YouTube Learning API returns MOCKED placeholder data. AI Coach uses GPT-5.2 via Emergent LLM Key for real AI responses.

mocked_apis.YouTube Learning: /api/learning/youtube returns placeholder video links instead of real YouTube API results

gamification.xp_system: Working - XP calculated based on difficulty and time
gamification.level_system: Working - Levels from 1-1000 with exponential XP curve
gamification.streak_system: Working - Multiplier bonus for consecutive days

ai_features.ai_coach: Working - 4 personality modes with real AI responses
ai_features.boss_exam: Working - AI generates multiple choice questions
ai_features.grading_system: Working - A*, A, B, C, D, F grades with XP multipliers

admin_panel.dashboard: Working - shows system stats and user database
